meta.title: Panasa | Fintech Engineering Studio
meta.description: Panasa helps fintechs launch and scale with AI-native engineering, ops, and compliance.

hero.pill: Trusted by fintechs across EU, UK & APAC
hero.title: Ship your fintech in weeks & run 24/7
hero.subtitle: Your AI-native partner for Dev, Ops & Scale. No handoffs. No surprises.

services.title: Complete fintech services stack
services.subtitle: From development to operations, we cover every aspect of fintech delivery.

items.title: AI accelerated fintech engineering
items.text: Rapid platform MVPs, risk models, and card issuing pipelines with AI copilots.

items.title: AI powered fintech backoffice
items.text: Smart reconciliations, fraud monitoring, and automated exception handling.

items.title: Cyber resilience for fintech platforms
items.text: Threat modeling, monitoring, and high-availability incident response plans.

items.title: Global capability center as a service
items.text: Dedicated pods in multiple regions with unified delivery playbooks.

items.title: Fintech AI consulting
items.text: Strategic AI roadmaps, partner selection, and scale-up advisory.

items.title: Data & compliance as a service
items.text: Privacy-by-design pipelines, observability dashboards, and governance.

why.title: Why fintechs choose Panasa
why.subtitle: What sets us apart in the fintech delivery landscape.

cards.title: Payment experts, not generalists
cards.text: 20+ years building card platforms, not generic software. We speak authorization flows, 3DS, and scheme integrations fluently.

cards.title: Proven at scale
cards.text: Supporting platforms processing 10M+ transactions monthly. We’ve been there, scaled that.

cards.title: Full-stack team
cards.text: From strategy to 24/7 ops — no vendor juggling needed. One team, end-to-end ownership.

cards.title: Compliance-first approach
cards.text: ISO 27001 certified, PCI-DSS aligned, GDPR compliant. Built-in audit readiness from day one.

caseStudies.title: Proven results for leading platforms
caseStudies.subtitle: Real outcomes from real projects with issuer processors and neobanks.

slides.title: Built and now operating card issuing platform processing 10M+ transactions monthly
slides.text: Leading issuer processor needed to rapidly scale their card platform while maintaining 99.95%+ uptime and reducing operational costs.

slides.title: Scaled multi-region ledger for 4M+ users with automated reconciliation
slides.text: Delivered a resilient ledger and reconciliations stack, reducing manual ops while enabling new market launches.

slides.title: Launched new BIN program with automated risk controls in 10 weeks
slides.text: Partnered with compliance and engineering teams to deliver a high-velocity launch with built-in controls.

slides.title: Rebuilt backoffice ops for a global wallet provider
slides.text: Consolidated fraud tooling, reconciliation, and reporting into a unified ops command center.

slides.title: Seamless processor migration with zero downtime
slides.text: Executed a multi-processor migration with automated testing and real-time telemetry dashboards.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Fintech Leaders
testimonials.subtitle: What our partners say about scaling with Panasa.

cards.text: Panasa became our extended fintech engineering team. They understand authorization flows, 3DS authentication, and scheme integrations better than most in-house teams we’ve seen.
cards.name: John Doe

cards.text: We eliminated multiple vendor relationships by consolidating with Panasa. From development to 24/7 operations, they handle everything with true payment domain expertise.
cards.name: Sarah Miller

engagement.title: Flexible engagement models
engagement.subtitle: Choose the model that fits your needs — from team augmentation to full managed services.

items.title: Engineering squads
items.text: Dedicated cross-functional squads for product build and integrations.

items.title: Managed services
items.text: Operate and scale your platform with SLAs, audits, and automation.

items.title: Project-based
items.text: Fixed scope engagements for launches, migrations, or audits.

items.title: GDC delivery model
items.text: Global delivery pods with clear ownership and cross-timezone coverage.

engagement.note: Most clients start with a project and graduate to managed services as they scale.

footer.ctaTitle: Ready to build your card platform
footer.ctaText: Let’s discuss your requirements. Our team will show you exactly how we can help — from custom development to 24/7 operations.
footer.brandText: From technical leaders to operations teams, we deliver value across your entire organization.
